title: "Heat and Road Traffic Mortality in 272 LA Cities"
format: gfm
---

## Files

| File Name                    | File Purpose                                                                                 |
|------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `Preliminary_subgroup.ipynb` | Process (non-imputed) data for use in analysis.                                              |
| `00_aggregate_data.R`        | Equivalent to `Preliminary_subgroup.ipynb` (processes non-imputed data), but written in `R`. |

## Manuscript

These files produce the analysis found in MS252, which analyzes associations of heat exposure with road traffic mortality in 272 Latin American cities.
